docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 25. -- Mrs. Roosevelt received a few friends this afternoon. Theodore Roosevelt, Jr., and his brother Kermit arrived at the White House to-day from Groton to enjoy a two weeks' vacation. During this time they will accompany their mother and a few friends on a cruise on the Mayflower, which is now in readiness at the Washington Navy Yard.

headline.main: SOCIETY IN WASHINGTON.; IN THE SHOPS.
